Title: Authorizes Michael J. Cappiello to purchase service credit for service with the Long Island Railroad Company police department
Summary: Authorizes Michael J. Cappiello to purchase service credit for service with the Long Island Railroad Company police department prior to its merger with the MTA and the state retirement system.
ActClause: AN ACT authorizing Michael J. Cappiello to purchase service credit for service with the Long Island Railroad Company police department
